light_reminder_off.description: Disables the eye fatigue reminder/notification (EYECARE SMART LAMP 2 ONLY).

entity_id.description: Name of the entity to act on.
entity_id.name: Entity ID

light_reminder_off.name: Light reminder off

light_reminder_on.description: Enables the eye fatigue reminder/notification (EYECARE SMART LAMP 2 ONLY).

entity_id.description: Name of the entity to act on.
entity_id.name: Entity ID

light_reminder_on.name: Light reminder on

time_period.description: Time period for the delayed turn off.
time_period.name: Time period

slot.description: Define the slot used to save the IR command.
slot.name: Slot

timeout.description: Define the timeout, before which the command must be learned.
timeout.name: Timeout

vacuum_remote_control_move.description: Remote controls the vacuum cleaner, make sure you first set it in remote control mode with `remote_control_start`.
vacuum_remote_control_move.name: Vacuum remote control move

vacuum_remote_control_move_step.description: Remote controls the vacuum cleaner, only makes one move and then stops.
vacuum_remote_control_move_step.name: Vacuum remote control move step

vacuum_remote_control_start.description: Starts remote control of the vacuum cleaner. You can then move it with `remote_control_move`, when done call `remote_control_stop`.
vacuum_remote_control_start.name: Vacuum remote control start

vacuum_remote_control_stop.description: Stops remote control mode of the vacuum cleaner.
vacuum_remote_control_stop.name: Vacuum remote control stop
